title: Math Camp 2024
text:
Why are we here?
Welcome to. the Math Camp 2024, organised by the Department of Government, Georgetown University.
You can find the course [syllabus and material from classes here] (https://georgetown.app.box.com/folder/280530661466?s=wzonmybotewi5unhs9jmszvhwbgewtdq).
Classes would take place between 9 - 4 pm in ICC 234.
This week will learn two things:

Some Maths
Some Programming on R

Both of these parts are meant to be introductory/review preparing you for basic fluency in quantitative tools that would come in handy in different courses.
This website would largely concern with material on R and LaTeX. We would use RStudio for working with these.
Use the [link here] (https://rstudio-education.github.io/hopr/starting.html) to install RStudio on your systems.

title: Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

1 + 1
